text: Aur apnay gharon mein qarar say raho aur qadeem jahiliyat kay zamaney ki tarah apna banao ka izhar na kero aur namaz ada kerti raho aur zakat deti raho aur Allah aur uss kay rasool ki itaat guzari kero. Allah Taalaa yehi chahta hai kay aey nabi ki ghar waliyon! Tum say woh ( her qisam ki) gandagi ko door kerday aur tumhen khoob pak ker day
